ygData.subject: Re: OT: DoT bug fix on patch server
ygData.msgSnippet: ... YEAH!!!! I was experimenting with DDD in East Freeport, munching rats, bats, snakes and fire beatles, and I noticed an overwhelming tendency for the corpse
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:49 PM 8/30/99 -0700, you wrote:

>4. The DoT bug realted to not getting experience or a corpse has been fixed.

YEAH!!!!

I was experimenting with DDD in East Freeport, munching rats, bats, snakes
and fire beatles, and I noticed an overwhelming tendency for the corpse to
just up and vanish. Then, last night in Unrest, we had a particularly
tough combat with a Skeletal Monk, and the Necro in our party hit it with a
DoT - darned if the blasted corpse didn't vanish! And it was my loot, too
:( Things went downhill from there.

Anyway - um - the Bard-related point here is that, apparently, DDD *is*
treated as a DoT, so I imagine Chords are, too, thus Bards may in fact be
affected by the Kiting changes. Hrmph - good thing we're so awesome at
everything else ;)

Talies the Wanderer
